title: Doks Page Frontmatter
description: Frontmatter schema for Doks markdown pages

title.title: Page Title
title.description: The main title of your page

description.title: Description
description.description: Brief description of the page for SEO and metadata

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Short summary displayed on list pages and cards

lead.title: Lead Text
lead.description: Lead paragraph displayed prominently below the title (supports HTML)

date.title: Publication Date
date.description: Date when the page was published

lastmod.title: Last Modified Date
lastmod.description: Date when the page was last modified

draft.title: Draft Status
draft.description: If true, page won't be published in production builds

weight.title: Sort Weight
weight.description: Order weight for sorting (lower numbers appear first)

toc.title: Table of Contents
toc.description: Show table of contents navigation for this page

type.title: Content Type
type.description: Hugo content type (affects which layout template is used)

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Categories this content belongs to (typically for blog posts)

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags for categorizing content (typically for blog posts)

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: List of contributor names for this content

pinned.title: Pinned Post
pinned.description: Pin this post to the top of lists

homepage.title: Show on Homepage
homepage.description: Feature this content on the homepage

headline.title: Headline
headline.description: Alternative headline to display instead of title (for taxonomy and list pages)

avatar.title: Avatar Image
avatar.description: Filename of avatar image for contributor/author pages (must be a page resource)

exclude_search.title: Exclude from Search
exclude_search.description: If true, this page won't appear in search results

sitemap_exclude.title: Exclude from Sitemap
sitemap_exclude.description: If true, this page won't be included in sitemap.xml

seo.title: SEO Settings
seo.description: Advanced SEO configuration for this page

title.title: Custom SEO Title
title.description: Override the page title for SEO purposes (optional)

description.title: Custom SEO Description
description.description: Custom meta description for search engines (recommended)

canonical.title: Canonical URL
canonical.description: Specify a canonical URL if this content is duplicated elsewhere (optional)

noindex.title: No Index
noindex.description: Prevent search engines from indexing this page

images.title: Social Share Images
images.description: Images for social media sharing (Open Graph, Twitter Cards)

aliases.title: URL Aliases
aliases.description: Alternative URLs that redirect to this page

layout.title: Custom Layout
layout.description: Specify a custom layout template for this page

outputs.title: Output Formats
outputs.description: Which output formats to generate for this page

cascade.title: Cascade Settings
cascade.description: Frontmatter values to cascade to descendant pages

resources.title: Page Resources
resources.description: Configure page bundle resources (images, files, etc.)
